idea-plugin.name: PackageBuild
idea-plugin.description: The main problem that the plug-in solves is a packaging tool for incremental upgrade code when deploying traditional JAVA WEB projects. Support packaging class files and static files, including JSP, JS, SQL scripts. Instructions for use: Install the plug-in and run the Java Web project. Click Build->packageBuild menu to pop up the packaging interface. First configure the corresponding project path, then switch the packaging interface,and select the project to be packaged for packaging operation. Finally, the plug-in will pack a list of files that need to be upgraded, generate a folder in the specified directory, and complete the packaging.
